on-international-boards.prompt: Review the editorial board of an international journal
on-international-boards.details: Find a journal in your discipline that describes itself as international. Review how globally representative its editorial board is.

your-citing.details: For the last article you published, review the authors you cited. How many are women? People of color?

on-board.prompt: Review who’s on the editorial boards
on-board.details: Of the last three journals you published in. How representative are each? Racially? Geographically? By gender? Bonus points for editorial boards you participate on.
